name: Escape from Juggalo Mountain
description:
ESCAPE FROM JUGGALO MOUNTAIN: ACT I

A visual novella about coming of age in a separatist society.

================

Note:  this game takes 1 – 2 hours to play. If you need to take a break, we recommend just leaving this browser tab open so you don't lose your progress.

================

A game by Nick Cummings, Ben Morgan, and Nathan Harrison

Illustrations by Sarah Morgan
